entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 5:54 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: SSE 30 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning early this evening and ending after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain after midnight. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
